mapper.insert: insert into t_system (Fid, Fname, Fdescription, Furl, Fclient_id, Fclient_secret, Fredirect_urls, Fimportance, Fcreate_time, Fcreator, Fmodify_time, Fdeveloper, Fstate, Freason, Ftwice_login_enabled, Fexpire_notify, Fcheck_enabled, Fsign, Fbackup_auditor, Foa_enabled) values (#{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{furl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fclientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fclientSecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fredirectUrls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fimportance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fcreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fcreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fmodifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fdeveloper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{freason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ftwiceLoginEnabled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fexpireNotify,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fcheckEnabled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fsign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fbackupAuditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foaEnabled,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_system set Fname = #{fname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Fdescription = #{fdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Furl = #{furl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Fclient_id = #{fclientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Fclient_secret = #{fclientSecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Fredirect_urls = #{fredirectUrls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Fimportance = #{fimportance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Fcreate_time = #{fcreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Fcreator = #{fcreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Fmodify_time = #{fmodifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Fdeveloper = #{fdeveloper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Fstate = #{fstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Freason = #{freason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Ftwice_login_enabled = #{ftwiceLoginEnabled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Fexpire_notify = #{fexpireNotify,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Fcheck_enabled = #{fcheckEnabled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Fsign = #{fsign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Fbackup_auditor = #{fbackupAuditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Foa_enabled = #{foaEnabled,jdbcType=INTEGER} where Fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select Fid, Fname, Fdescription, Furl, Fclient_id, Fclient_secret, Fredirect_urls, Fimportance, Fcreate_time, Fcreator, Fmodify_time, Fdeveloper, Fstate, Freason, Ftwice_login_enabled, Fexpire_notify, Fcheck_enabled, Fsign, Fbackup_auditor, Foa_enabled from t_system where Fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select Fid, Fname, Fdescription, Furl, Fclient_id, Fclient_secret, Fredirect_urls, Fimportance, Fcreate_time, Fcreator, Fmodify_time, Fdeveloper, Fstate, Freason, Ftwice_login_enabled, Fexpire_notify, Fcheck_enabled, Fsign, Fbackup_auditor, Foa_enabled from t_system

select Fid, Fname, Fdescription, Furl, Fclient_id, Fclient_secret, Fredirect_urls, Fimportance, Fcreate_time, Fcreator, Fmodify_time, Fdeveloper, Fstate, Freason, Ftwice_login_enabled, Fexpire_notify, Fcheck_enabled, Fsign, Fbackup_auditor, Foa_enabled from t_system where Fclient_id = #{clientId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
